creditline: Gift of the estate of Margaret Lamberton Sweatt and Charles Baxter Sweatt, Sr.
description: black patina; ovoid-shaped pot and small tray/ stand; mythological images of Artemis (with a crescent above her head and stars on her drapery) and Apollo (driving his chariot), each accompanied by a winged figure blowing a horn and another standing figure, in relief on each side
title: Teapot with stand
